DOC.brief_summary: The optimal strategy for catheter ablation of persistent atrial fibrillation is not clearly defined. This study investigates if Complex Fractionated Atrial Electrogram (CFAE) ablation in addition to pulmonary vein isolation and linear ablations improves single procedural success rate over a 12 month follow up period.
DOC.criteria: persistent atrial fibrillation previous catheter or surgical ablation for atrial fibrillation pregnancy
